HSAS, like all forms of L1 syndrome, is caused by changes (mutations) in the L1CAM gene and is inherited in an X-linked recessive manner. Treatment is based on the signs and symptoms present in each person.",GARD,Hydrocephalus due to congenital stenosis of aqueduct of sylvius
